metadata.title: CVE-2024-53916 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In OpenStack Neutron before 25.0.1, neutron/extensions/tagging.py can usean incorrect ID during policy enforcement. It does not apply the properpolicy check for changing network tags. An unprivileged tenant is able tochange (add and clear) tags on network objects that do not belong to thetenant, and this action is not subjected to the proper policy authorizationcheck. This affects 23 before 23.2.1, 24 before 24.0.2, and 25 before25.0.1.

criterions.comment: neutron package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
